bibl.seg: Dionisius A. Agius, John P. Cooper, Athena Trakadas & Chiara Zazzaro (edd.), Navigated Spaces, Connected Places. Proceedings of Red Sea Project V Held at the University of Exeter, 16-19 September 2010 = British Foundation for the Study of Arabia Monographs. 12 = BAR International Series. 2346.
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2012, 4°, xviii-249 pp., nombr. ill. ISBN 978-1-4073-0929-3. £42.

23 contributions. - Part I. Recollections. - Part II. Early navigation and contact. - Part III. The sea in Classical Antiquity. - Part IV. From the Classical to the Islamic. - Part V. Suakin. - Part VI. People and the environment in the Red Sea region. - Pp. ix-xi: J.P.C., Ch.Z. & D.A.A., Introduction; - 247-249: Select index.
